knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

#Libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(naniar)
```


```{r}
getwd()
```

# Load data
```{r}
ecosphere <- read.csv("ecosphere.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
miss_var_summary(ecosphere)
```

```{r}
names(ecosphere)
options(scipen=999)
```
```{r}
ecosphere %>% 
  replace_with_na(replace = list(habitat= " "))
```

# Filter out Habitat
```{r}
ecosphere %>% 
  count(habitat)
```

#Habitat
```{r}
ecosphere %>%
   filter(habitat != ".") %>% 
  count(habitat) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=habitat, y=n))+
  geom_col()+
  labs(title = "")
```

# Migrator Strategy 
```{r}
ecosphere %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=urban_affiliate, y=winter_range_area, fill = migratory_strategy))+
  geom_col(position = "dodge")+
  facet_grid(~habitat)+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = , hjust = 1))
```
